features: 🎁Educational Toys For Toddler Boys: Draw, write and play games on this erasable sketch pad using the stylus to encourage your child’s creativity and help them to learn how to express themselves visually. Not just for art. Use magnetic drawing boards for math, number recognition, learning shapes, even does their homework.

🎁Child Seat Or A Drawing Pad: Unique screw tightening design and high-quality legs allow the drawing board to have a strong load-bearing capacity, up to 120lbs. No need to worry about shaking or breaking. The 4 legs of drawing table can be detachable and changed the format for 3 ways. Let children draw more freely and comfortably.

🎁Easy To Use: The design of the handle belt is convenient to carry everywhere.These erasable doodle board can also be taken on car, train, boat, and plane journeys, and 1 2 3 year old girls won’t create a mess on grandma’s carpet the way paints might. The pen and the rope is integrated, no need to worry about the sudden loss of the pen, allowing children to draw more smoothly.

🎁Safe&Environmentally Friendly: Made of non-toxic, BPA-free, eco-friendly ABS plastic material. It's a mess-free, reusable way to feed toddler girl age 1-2’s desire to create and scribble. Instead of costly reams of paper, paints, crayons, pencils, and other art supplies you need to restock, the board lasts as long as for 1 2 year old girl’s attention span. And your walls will be saved from those crayon or marker lines that can be hard to remove.

🎁Larger Drawing Zones: Magnetic drawing board for toddlers 1-3 displays 4 colors (Red, Yellow, Blue, Green) that make child’s drawing more vivid. With 8.9" screen doodle pad can be used repeatedly. One year old boys can easily pull the slide back and forth, then it will be clean again. Extend the life of the toy and let your child love it all the time. The design of the pen and the rope is integrated, no need to worry about the sudden loss of the pen, allowing children to draw more smoothly.

🎁 Gifts For 1 2 Year Old Boys: Funny toys for children, kids love it. Another boredom buster for being stuck in quarantine. Our toddler writing board is a perfect gift for kids, giving full play to their creativity. Not only a nice holiday gift, birthday gift, Christmas gift, festivals gifts, visit gift for little girls and boys, but a relatively inexpensive way to give your child endless hours of artistic and educational opportunities.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Not Only A Magnetic Drawing Board But A Effective Early Education Tool Whether playing tic-tac-toe, practicing math, learning about shapes, or creating pictures, a magnetic drawing board is a versatile tool for your child. A mess-free, reusable way to feed your child’s desire to create and scribble. Instead of costly reams of paper, paints, crayons, pencils, and other art supplies you need to restock, one board lasts as long as your child’s attention span. And your walls will be saved from those crayon or marker lines that can be hard to remove.These sketch pads can also be taken on car, train, boat, and plane journeys, and they won’t create a mess on grandma’s carpet the way paints might.It not just for art. Use magnetic drawing boards for math, number recognition, learning shapes, or for anything you might write down or draw.Use them to draw together, learn together, and laugh together. They offer a type of screen time you can feel good about. And when you’re child draws something extraordinary, remember to snap a quick picture of it before it’s erased.

Installation Steps The direction of the spiral groove on the support leg is inserted and aligned with the mounting hole on the drawing board;Rotate the leg clockwise until the fixed screw is no longer movable;Make sure the four legs are facing outwards.

Larger Drawing Board The overall edge design has no burrs and smooth rounded corners, making it safer for children to hold without hurting their delicate hands. The 9.8 inch drawing board allows more space for children to play. No Choking Risks There is no choking small parts in the package for kids ages from 12 months to 3 year old. Enough rope length to allow either the right or left hand to draw freely. Non-toxic&Safer Material It is made of high quality non-toxic and tasteless ABS material, and is safe for baby toys over 12 months, bringing children a safer and happy childhood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mess free and fun
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the toddler magic chalkboard and I am extremely pleased with this product. It has quickly become one of my toddler's favorite toys.The chalkboard is well-made and sturdy, perfect for little hands. The size of the board is also great for small kids, not too big or small.The best thing about this chalkboard is the magic feature. The chalk provided with the board is not only colorful but also wipes off easily, making it perfect for young children who tend to make a mess. My toddler loves scribbling and drawing on the board and then watching it magically disappear with just a swipe of the eraser. It keeps her entertained for a long time.The set also comes with an eraser and a storage tray for the chalk, making it easy to clean up and keep everything organized.I also appreciate that the chalkboard is double-sided, which adds to the overall value and variety of options for my toddler to play with.Overall, I highly recommend the toddler magic chalkboard. It is a great toy for little ones to explore their creativity and practice their

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great sketch screen for little ones.
reviews.reviewText: This sketch screen is easy to use and assemble. (The legs could be a little sturdier). The connected stylus prevents losing it. The ability to use the screen with or without the legs makes this screen suitable for travel. The colors in the created graphic are fun… not just a grey line. Suitable for even one year olds as they develop small motor skills.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I got this for my son on Christmas upon unwrapping and putting together he started going to town. It is friendly for kids and easy to use. He even erases it himself. Love the fact it has 4 different color zones he's entranced with the drawing and I don't have to use cases of paper now. With the legs screw in and out its easy to take with us so he can use in car even if wanted to or at doctors. It's light enough he can carry it and lift it and perfect pen holder on side as well. Well worth what spent!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Magnadoodle with legs
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this for our 2-year-old and he loves it. It is a perfect height for him to stand and doodle on. It is a rainbow gradient rather than the old grey colored magnet board. It is lightweight and easy to move to clean around, and if you had to travel with it, the legs are easy to take off and put back on while still secure enough that they stand up to the abuse of a toddler.

reviews.reviewTitle: Una tavoletta grafica per disegnare all’infinito che non passa mai di moda
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. 👉 Prodotto ricevuto attraverso il programma Vine di Amazon, in modo da testarlo e fornire una recensione obiettiva e sincera.🔎 Ho richiesto questo prodotto per il mio bambino di 27 mesi che ama disegnare e scrivere. Devo dire che la utilizziamo anche noi genitori per ritornare indietro negli anni.📦PACKAGINGLa scatola esterna in cartonato personalizzato è ben realizzato dal punto di vista grafico ed esplicativo rende il prodotto perfetto per un'eventuale idea regalo. Al suo interno troviamo:- 1 x lavagnetta grafica magnetica;- 1 x pennina grafica per lavagnetta con laccetto;- 4 x supporti;- 1 x manuale d'uso.📌CARATTERISTICHELa lavagnetta magnetica a 4 colori della “SMASIAGON” è stata veramente una bella scoperta. Partiamo dal fatto che non si spreca carta e quindi contribuisce a preservare l’ambiente. Inoltre è utile per far disegnare i nostri bambini senza il problema di sporcarsi gli indumenti.La scocca esterna è realizzata in plastica leggerissima così come la matita in dotazione. Provvista di una maniglietta in gomma per il trasporto e di 4 piedini ad incastro per essere utilizzata come tavolinetto. Il montaggio risulta semplice e veloce.Nella parte centrale troviamo l’ampio spazio dove poter scrivere e disegnare. L’unico accessorio presente è la pennina grafica correlata di laccetto e vano porta penna in gomma. Mancano le formine presenti in altri prodotti pari livello. All’interno della cornice, la lastra della lavagna vera e propria consiste in un rettangolo bianco con un reticolo molto sottile, al di sotto del quale si trova uno strato di gel dove si muovono particelle molto fini di frammenti di ferro magnetizzati. Quando il bambino passa la penna con punta magnetica, questa attiverà i frammenti di ferro nei punti solcati. Per cancellare il disegno basta far scorrere la barra cancellino bidirezionale di cui è dotata la lavagna e che passa sotto tutta la superficie, annullando l'effetto magnetico della penna. Bisogna effettuare 2-3 passaggi affinché il disegno venga totalmente rimosso.Il tratto è ben definito e con colorazione (rosso, giallo, verde e blu) preimpostata nei diversi quadranti. Praticamente in base al punto in cui si disegna, questo cambierà colore.🏁CONCLUSIONIAl momento della recensione il prezzo è di 23.99€. In definitiva si tratta di un prodotto veramente utile, rispettoso dell’ambiente e adatto ai piccoli artisti. Mio figlio lo adora e si diverte tantissimo a scrivere e cancellare. Da considerare come ottima idea regalo. Infinitamente consigliato!Spero di essere stato utile ✌️
